name: con·junc·tion
description:
/kənˈjəNG(k)SH(ə)n/ noun, definition: the action or an instance of two or more events or things occurring at the same point in time or space.

Conjunction is a grid-based puzzler where you have to work with your former self to predict the position and state of the board. Once you have mastered the controls, try to complete the three challenges!

Made In 72 hrs For Ludum Dare 47: 
https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/47/con-junction

Objectives:
Place pieces in a strategic way in order to complete the in-game objectives.

Controls:
F - Action Key For Inventory And Placing Items
WASD - Move Cursor
Shift + WASD - Move Camera
F1 - Help
F10 - Volume
F11 - Fullscreen
R In Menu - Reset Loop
Esc - Menu
